NC.Q: Among the flows from node Livestreams to node News Aggregators, from node Video Sharing to node Subscriptions, and from node Live Chats to node Merch Sales, which path has the largest flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Likes to node Sponsorships, from node Virtual Gifts to node Young Adults, and from node Podcast Platforms to node Subscriptions, which path has the largest flow?
